attributes.action: levy a tax on plastic bottle production to reduce pollution of our coastal and maritime environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to levy a tax on plastic bottle production to reduce pollution of our coastal and maritime environment in addition to our whole country. This money could in part fund clean-up and further recycling; and also deter needless over-production of this blight on our shoreline and countryside.
